recipe.ingredients: - cottage cheese: 1 cup (low-fat) - cherry tomatoes: 1 cup - black pepper: 1/4 teaspoon - fresh basil leaves (chopped): 2 tablespoons - salt: pinch (optional)
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Ingredients: Wash the cherry tomatoes and chop the basil leaves. 2. Assemble Snack: In a medium bowl, combine the cottage cheese with cherry tomatoes. Sprinkle with black pepper, chopped basil, and a pinch of salt if desired. 3. Mix gently and serve cold.
